scripts.build-release: npm run build-wasm-release && npm run build-api && npm run build-cleanup
scripts.build-cleanup: rimraf dist/helpers/properties.ts && rimraf dist/web-ifc-api.ts && rimraf dist/ifc-schema.ts
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && npm run build-api
scripts.publish-repo: npm run set-version && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build-publish-repo: npm run build-release && cpy ./npmrc ./dist/  --rename=.npmrc && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.copy-to-dist: make-dir dist && cpy "src/wasm/build/*.js" dist &&  cpy "src/wasm/build/*.wasm" dist
scripts.copy-debug-to-dist: make-dir dist && cpy "src/wasm/build_debug/*.js" dist &&  cpy "src/wasm/build_debug/*.wasm" dist
scripts.build-wasm-debug: make-dir src/wasm/build_debug && cd src/wasm/build_debug && emcmake cmake .. -DEMSCRIPTEN=true -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug && emmake make && npm run copy-debug-to-dist
scripts.build-wasm-release: make-dir src/wasm/build && cd src/wasm/build && emcmake cmake .. -DEMSCRIPTEN=true -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && emmake make && npm run copy-to-dist
scripts.build-api: make-dir dist/helpers && npm run build-ts-api && npm run build-web-ifc-api-browser && npm run build-web-ifc-api-node && npm run build-web-ifc-api-umd &&cpy README.md dist && cpy package.json dist
scripts.build-ts-api: make-dir dist/helpers && cpy "src/*.ts" dist && cpy "src/helpers/*" dist/helpers --flat && tsc  --incremental --emitDeclarationOnly && cpy dist/web-ifc-api.d.ts . --rename=web-ifc-api-node.d.ts
scripts.build-web-ifc-api-node: make-dir dist && esbuild dist/web-ifc-api.ts --bundle --format=esm --external:path --define:__WASM_PATH__=\"./web-ifc-node\" --external:fs --external:os --external:perf_hooks --outfile=./dist/web-ifc-api-node.mjs && esbuild dist/web-ifc-api.ts --define:__WASM_PATH__=\"./web-ifc-node\" --bundle --platform=node --outfile=./dist/web-ifc-api-node.js
scripts.serve-viewer: npm run build-viewer && cd examples/viewer/ && npm run start
scripts.dev: npm run build-viewer && concurrently --kill-others "npm-watch" "cd examples/viewer && npm run start"
scripts.docker-run: npm run docker-run-container && npm run docker-get-compiled-files
scripts.regression-test-build: esbuild tests/regression/src/index.js --bundle --sourcemap --platform=node --outfile=tests/regression/dist/test.js && cd tests/regression && cpy public/*.html dist/ --flat && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc.wasm dist/web-ifc.wasm && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc.js dist/web-ifc.js && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc-mt.wasm dist/web-ifc-mt.wasm && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc-mt.worker.js dist/web-ifc-mt-worker.js && cpy ../../dist/web-ifc-mt.js dist/web-ifc-mt.js
scripts.regression-test: npm run regression-test-build && cd tests/regression/dist && ws -p 8080 --cors.opener-policy same-origin --cors.embedder-policy require-corp
